description:
Datasette is described by its creator, Simon Willison, as "a tool for
exploring and publishing data", and it provides an amazing data
presentation, exploration, and retrieval platform that can rapidly be
deployed to local, cloud or traditional web servers. In this Thunder
Talk, I'll demonstrate a project where I deployed an instance of
Datasette at the Cincinnati & Hamilton County Public Library to rapidly
provide reports to domain experts who are focusing on item and
bibliographic record data.

Datasette Project
-----------------

https://datasette.io/

Cincinnati & Hamilton County Public Library Collection-Analysis
---------------------------------------------------------------

https://ilsweb.cincinnatilibrary.org/collection-analysis/
title: I ❤️ Datasette: An Open Source Multi-tool for Exploring and Publishing Data
